entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
